description:
At 25 years old, Adam is still a young buck. He's shown off on our other sites, so it was a matter of time before we featured him on NextDoorMale.

Adam is a beefy, tall dirty-blonde haired guy with a hot body and a great personality. He likes to joke around yet be serious enough to be a well paid salesman...that is, when he's not doing porn.

For this scene, Adam undresses in the bedroom, teases himself in the shower, and blows his creamy load on the bed...while upside down!

Enjoy!
title: Adam
